Reviews.Title: Camera waterproof, menu control not
Reviews.Author: A. Zychowicz
Reviews.Content: The camera worked well until water seeped into the built in menu control on the power cable.  DO NOT USE THIS FOR OUTDOOR APPLICATIONS.  Amazon refunded me the purchase price.  I think the company is out of China.

ProductInfo.Features:
600 TV lines
WDR (Wide Dynamic Range)
OSD Menu
Auto Gain Control
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc GW633H Professional 600TVL 1/3-Inch Sony CCD Bullet Outdoor CCTV Surveillance Video Security Camera - 3.6mm Wide Angle Lens, 48 IR LED, WDR, PSD Menu
